UNANIMOUS CONSENT AGREEMENT--EXECUTIVE CALENDAR; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 23

congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Senate resumed consideration of the nomination of Steven T. Mnuchin, of California, to be Secretary of the Treasury.<P/>During consideration of this nomination today, Senate also took the following action:<P/>By 53 yeas to 46 nays (Vote No. 62), Senate agreed to the motion to close further debate on the nomination.
